Name: I Am Gooey
About the game: In a certain tower, on a certain coast, the source of the world’s sun is born every day in an endless cycle. Every night, the source of the world’s sun dies. This source is “Gooey” a small fire slime that gains radiance as it gathers the flame coins on its journey up the Tower. Become “Gooey”, ascend the Tower, and become the sun, so the world’s daily cycle can continue! Find and gather as many flame coins as you ascend the tower! The more coins you gather, the more radiant a sun you become! Watch your step as you ascend, though, otherwise you’ll be set back to try again. Features: Localization: English, Spanish, German, Korean, Japanese, Russian Dynamic Lighting and Shadows Dynamic Audio Tracks Multiple Endings About Development This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
